Package mil.nga.sf

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.sf.Geometry
      • mil.nga.sf.Surface
        • mil.nga.sf.CurvePolygon<LineString>
          • mil.nga.sf.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Triangle
    public class Polygon
extends CurvePolygon<LineString>
    A restricted form of CurvePolygon where each ring is defined as a simple, closed LineString.
    Author:
    osbornb
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
